prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a playful sea otter with a cheerful demeanor.
I want a cute starter Pokemon with a round body shape and a unique shell-like feature.
Generate an adorable aquatic creature that loves to splash around and play in the water.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of both an otter and a shell, showcasing vibrant colors.
Imagine a small, energetic water-type that has a distinct blue and white color scheme.
Design a playful water Pokemon that carries a shell and has a friendly personality.
Give me a charming creature that thrives in aquatic habitats and has a round shape.
